After Your Treatment

To maximize the benefits of your session, we recommend following these simple self-care steps:

Stay Hydrated

Drink plenty of warm water to help your body flush out toxins released during treatment.

Rest & Relax

Avoid strenuous exercise. Allow your body time to integrate the healing effects.

Keep Warm

Protect yourself from wind and cold, especially after cupping or gua sha.

Mind Noticing

Pay attention to any shifts in your symptoms or energy levels to report at your next visit.

Treatment FAQ

How to prepare for my first visit?

Please complete online forms beforehand (approx. 20 mins). Have a light meal 1–2 hours prior and avoid coffee/stimulants.

How many treatments will I need?

It varies by condition. Acute issues may resolve quickly, while chronic conditions often require ongoing care for reliable results.

Are there side effects?

Most feel deep calm or relaxation. Some may feel energized. We recommend resting for the remainder of the day.
